## Channel.select() method

Takes an array of channels and blocks until any of them becomes readable (or has been closed). The returned promised resolves into an array of `[value, channel]`<!-- -->. Channel order is repeatedly shuffled for each read attempt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static select(chans: Channel<any>[]): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  chans | <code>Channel&lt;any&gt;[]</code> | source channels |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<any>`
